waterhole.commonlibs.preferences

Class SharedPreferencesUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • waterhole.commonlibs.preferences.SharedPreferencesUtils

  • public final class SharedPreferencesUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility for SharedPreferences access. Currently just support the default one.
